comments.body: One follow-up question: `numpy.dtype[{float64}]` is a little verbose. How hard would it be to make `numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.float64]` work?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@reveal_type(a[:])  # E: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.str_]]
reveal_type(a.__array__())  # E: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.str_]]
reveal_type(a.__array__(np.dtype(np.float64)))  # E: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[{float64}]]
